item.title: Choosing The Right Javascript Framework A Deep Dive Into React Vs Angular Vs Vue
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Selecting the ideal JavaScript framework can be a daunting task, particularly when faced with an abundance of highly resourceful and capable options.

item.title: Lessons Learned From Being A Part Of Corporate Micro Frontend Implementation
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction As we venture further into the dynamic world of frontend development, we developers are on a constant quest for techniques that boost productivity, maintainability, and collaboration among multiple teams.

item.title: Cost Of React Native
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: React Native is a popular cross-platform app development framework that allows developers to build mobile apps for both iOS and Android platforms using a single codebase.

item.title: Continuous Translation
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Continuous Translation (CT) is a modern approach to translation management that involves synchronizing software development and translation workflows. This means that developers, translators, and product owners work together in a continuous cycle to ensure that all translations are up-to-date and aligned with the latest software developments.

item.title: What is PNPM Compare To NPM/Yarn
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is PNPM? At Dwarves Foundation, we are always on the lookout for new tech. Researching PNPM was originally from research on what package manager Next.

item.title: I18n Frontend Guideline
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In a front-end web application, locales are used to determine the language and geographic location of the user and to display the appropriate content to them.

item.title: Radio Talk 61 Monorepo
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Demystifying Monorepos: A Recap of Our Recent Sharing Session During our recent sharing session, we delved into the world of monorepos, exploring their benefits, challenges, and the tools available to manage them effectively.

item.title: From Multi Repo To Monorepo A Case Study With Nghenhan Turbo Monorepo
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In this case study, we share our experience of transitioning from multi-repository structure to a monorepo using Turbo in our project.

item.title: Why We Chose Our Tech Stack Accelerating Development With A Robust Frontend Solution
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: At Dwarves Foundation, we pride ourselves on being a team of seasoned technology experts, passionate about crafting innovative solutions for our clients.
